summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志指定是否始终用相对图表坐标来定义批注的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.

value.span: 如果 批注的和 始终处于图表相对坐标，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the and of an annotation are always in chart relative coordinates; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注的宽度和高度可以在相对图表中或轴坐标中进行设置。The width and height of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates. 默认情况下，使用相对图表坐标。By default, relative chart coordinates are used. 若要将轴坐标用于批注大小，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To use axes coordinates for the annotation size, set the property to `false`. 然后将该批注定位到数据点，或设置 或 属性。Then anchor the annotation to a data point or set the or properties.
